typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Survey ID} as string,
		{Store Number} as string,
		{Store Location} as string,
		{Store Setting} as string,
		Age as string,
		Exchange as string,
		{Survey Date } as string,
		VideoGames as string,
		{Academic Books} as string,
		Toys as string,
		{OutDoor SportKits} as string,
		{InDoor SportKits} as string,
		Gadgets as string,
		{NonAcademic Books} as string,
		{Number of Items Purchased} as string,
		{Total Amount of Purchases} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StudentSurvey
